channel.title: Comments on: Monday Go Meditation: Game 23

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: Thanks Rob! This is definitely something that also plagues my game as well and if I ever discover a cure for it, I'll be sure to let you know. =) Glad you enjoy the reviews! I'll be sure to keep posting them! =D
item.content:encoded: Thanks Rob! This is definitely something that also plagues my game as well and if I ever discover a cure for it, I’ll be sure to let you know. =) Glad you enjoy the reviews! I’ll be sure to keep posting them! =D

item.title: By: Machinato
item.dc:creator: Machinato
item.description: This game pinpoints my worse bad habit. Sometimes it seems I make moves with a great theory or idea attached to them only to need to abandon my concept in the face of my opponents better plays. sigh... I do admit being angry with myself when this happens. every game. many times. Still, I learned a lot from this kifu and appreciate you taking the time to make it available. Keep up the great work, Ben. Rob
item.content:encoded: This game pinpoints my worse bad habit. Sometimes it seems I make moves with a great theory or idea attached to them only to need to abandon my concept in the face of my opponents better plays. sigh… I do admit being angry with myself when this happens. every game. many times. Still, I learned a lot from this kifu and appreciate you taking the time to make it available. Keep up the great work, Ben. Rob

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: I thought K12 was pretty direct in removing eyes from Black. But in all honesty man, we all make those kinds of moves. =) And at the end of the game, it was a slaughter by White. So nothing to worry about! =D
item.content:encoded: I thought K12 was pretty direct in removing eyes from Black. But in all honesty man, we all make those kinds of moves. =) And at the end of the game, it was a slaughter by White. So nothing to worry about! =D

item.title: By: Moboy78
item.dc:creator: Moboy78
item.description: I made to many moves without thinking this game =(. Moves like E7 and K12, both of which I'm nearly certain I don't need and spent so little time thinking about, just really annoy me. >.<
item.content:encoded: I made to many moves without thinking this game =(. Moves like E7 and K12, both of which I’m nearly certain I don’t need and spent so little time thinking about, just really annoy me. >.<
